name: excellence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being excellent: The school is noted for its academic excellence.
More examplesFewer examplesThis college has a long tradition of athletic excellence.The excellence of the skiing compensates for the ugliness of the resort.

the quality of being excellent: excellence in sth Both firms have a long-standing reputation for excellence in customer service.achieve/promote/encourage excellence Our company mission is to achieve excellence through innovation and integration. See also
